The three heads suddenly turned towards Hydras. His ears were down 
and he cowered in fear.

Leo: Please! Do not hate usses! We did nothing bad!

Dracon, however, did not intend to be discarded so easily. His 
dragon head was proud and terrible.

Dracon: I know you... You bear the smell of someone I knew... Was 
it? Yes! Megatron! Know, fool, that I am Chimera. I am Predacon, and 
I will rule this place should you prove unworthy of your predecessor.

His golden body stood in proudness and defiance, His lion head 
somewhat terrified, the goat head listening for information, and the 
dragon head acting as the current leader of the body. His leathered 
wings were open and his spiked spine extended as a long and thin 
whip-like tail.
